Headline: CNN 10 - April 9, 2020
Article_Body: April 9, 2020 The lockdown has been lifted in the first Chinese city to see coronavirus cases. Will this be repeated in other countries? And when will game clocks start ticking again in professional sports? These are today's first topics, followed by an explanation of the law of the sea as it applies to a highly disputed body of water. TRANSCRIPT Click here to access the printable version of today's CNN 10 transcript. CNN 10 serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom. The show's priority is to identify stories of international significance and then clearly describe why they're making news, who is affected, and how the events fit into a complex, international society. Thank you for using CNN 10
